#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int dp[1000000+3];
int mod=1000000000+9;
int sum(int x){
	if(x==0)
		return 1;
	if(x<0)
		return 0;
	if(dp[x]!=-1)
		return dp[x];
	dp[x]=(sum(x-2)+sum(x-3))%mod;
	return dp[x];
}
int main(){
	memset(dp,-1,sizeof(dp));
	int t,x;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		cin>>x;
		cout<<sum(x)<<endl;
	}
}
